TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 878
TEI.2.document_title: Thomas H Borden to Stephen F Austin, 10-20-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Memorandum of cattle collected for Austin, October 20, 1832.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 878

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Memorandum of cattle collected for Austin, October 20, 1832.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*A memorandum of Cattle Collected of [for] *person_mentioned*Col. S F Austin*/person_mentioned* out of the stock that sd. *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*bought of *person_mentioned*Rabbs*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-01-1832">May 1st 1832 */date_mentioned**/p* *p*one brindle steer which had been worked some little which steer I sold to *person_mentioned*J. Parker*/person_mentioned*___________ $25 00*/p*
*p*one three year old steer which sold to *person_mentioned*Parker */person_mentioned*at 10___ 10 00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-01-1832">June 1st*/date_mentioned* one white steer which I sold to *person_mentioned*James Cox*/person_mentioned*___ 20 00*/p* *p*10 00 55 00*/p* *p*one old cow that runs at *person_mentioned*A Castleman*/person_mentioned*______________ */p* *p*" young unbroke cow that runs at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*M. Allen*/person_mentioned*'s*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-20-1832">Oct. 20th */date_mentioned* which I sold to *person_mentioned*Father*/person_mentioned*________ 10 00*/p*
*p*one black cow and one 2 year old bull (this cow you got of *person_mentioned*Kelly Mc.Farland */person_mentioned*the calf died or was killed *date_mentioned n="SPring - 1832">last spring*/date_mentioned*) these cattle I let *person_mentioned*Father */person_mentioned*have which was valued at 17________ 17 00*/p* *p*7 00 37 00*/p* *p*The same cows yearling bull which I keep to run with my cattle these bull have no marks or brands but will some times suck the cow and of course they must be yours*/p* *p*one white yearlin which I sold to *person_mentioned*father */person_mentioned*of the stock of *person_mentioned*Rabbs*/person_mentioned*_______________ 5 00*/p*
*p*104 00*/p*
*p*[Indorsed:]*/p*
*p*A memorandum of Cattle which I collected of *person_mentioned*Col S F Austin*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1832">October 1832 */date_mentioned*By *person_mentioned*Thos. H Borden*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
